name: Zucchini-Sausage Pizza
recipeYield: 1 large, 2 medium, or more smaller pizzas
keywords: main course, pizza dough, sweet italian sausage, zucchini
recipeIngredient: 2 or 3 sweet Italian sausages, meat removed from the casing and crumbled

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice zucchini, salt lightly and let sit at least 20 minutes, then drain off any accumulated liquid.
Top pizza rounds with zucchini, sausage and garlic and bake about 15 minutes, or until nicely browned.
